title: 108_s2753
content: Zero Downpayment Act of 2004 - Amends the National Housing Act to authorize the Secretary of Housing and Urban Development to insure zero-downpayment mortgages of an eligible single family residence for a first-time homebuyer who has received specified homeownership counseling. Terminates program authority after September 30, 2011, except for mortgages executed prior to such date.
